column3: ACK, it can always be brought back when it is better tested\n
Has this been tested by someone who was experiencing the problem? \n
No, but it is basically the same fix suggested by one of the people who ran into the problem; see\n  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=106236.msg1175793#msg1175793\n
Closing, sipa's fix is reported to work.\n
